title: Sonance Speaker Switcher Selector 91931 - Overview
description:
Sonance Speaker Switcher Selector - 91931 http://www.abt.com/product/12608/Sonance-91931.html

Controls up to 4 sets of speakers with soft touch rotary volume control featuring advanced overload protection. Quick connectors on the rear panel make for a quick installation.

Specifications:
• 4 pair Speaker Selector / Volume Control
• Includes removable rack ears
• Power Rating: 75 Watts RMS Maximum Input per channel
• 12 position light touch silent rotary switch
• Screwless Quick Connectors 20-14 AWG wire capacity
• Frequency Response: 20-20kHz +/-1dB
• Speaker Impedance: 8 Ohms per zone
• Total Attenuation: -42dB: full clockwise position is straight through; full counterclockwise position is off.
• Attenuation by step: top 7 steps are -3dB per step; lowest 4 steps are -6dB per step.
